verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6602>Pethuel.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> O <S%H2205>elders,<s%> And <S%H238>listen,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%> Has [anything like] <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1961>happened<s%> in your <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H518>Or<s%> in your fathers' <S%H3117>days<s%>?
<S%H5608>Tell<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> about it, And [let] your <S%H1121>sons<s%> [tell] their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> And their <S%H1121>sons<s%> the <S%H312>next<s%> <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

<S%H3499>What<s%> the <S%H1501>gnawing<s%> <S%H1501>locust<s%> has <S%H3499>left,<s%> the <S%H697>swarming<s%> <S%H697>locust<s%> has <S%H398>eaten;<s%> And <S%H3499>what<s%> the <S%H697>swarming<s%> <S%H697>locust<s%> has <S%H3499>left,<s%> the <S%H3218>creeping<s%> <S%H3218>locust<s%> has <S%H398>eaten;<s%> And <S%H3499>what<s%> the <S%H3218>creeping<s%> <S%H3218>locust<s%> has <S%H3499>left,<s%> the <S%H2625>stripping<s%> <S%H2625>locust<s%> has <S%H398>eaten.<s%>

<S%H9516>Awake,<s%> <S%H7910>drunkards,<s%> and <S%H1058>weep;<s%> And <S%H3213>wail,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H8354>drinkers,<s%> On <S%H5921>account<s%> of the <S%H6071>sweet<s%> <S%H6071>wine<s%> That is <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

For a <S%H1471>nation<s%> has <S%H5927>invaded<s%> my <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H6099>Mighty<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4557>number;<s%> Its <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of a <S%H9030>lion,<s%> And it has the <S%H4973>fangs<s%> of a <S%H3833>lioness.<s%>

It has <S%H7760>made<s%> my <S%H1612>vine<s%> a <S%H8047>waste,<s%> And my <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H8384>tree<s%> <S%H7111>splinters.<s%> It has <S%H2834>stripped<s%> them <S%H2834>bare<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> [them] <S%H7993>away;<s%> Their <S%H8299>branches<s%> have <S%H3835>become<s%> <S%H3835>white.<s%>
<S%H421>Wail<s%> like a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H2296>girded<s%> with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> For the <S%H1167>bridegroom<s%> of her <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

The grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and the <S%H5262>libation<s%> are <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> From the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> The <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H56>mourn,<s%> The <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

The <S%H7704>field<s%> is <S%H7703>ruined,<s%> The <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H56>mourns,<s%> For the <S%H1715>grain<s%> is <S%H7703>ruined,<s%> The <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> <S%H3001>dries<s%> up, <S%H3323>Fresh<s%> <S%H3323>oil<s%> <S%H535>fails.<s%>

Be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> O <S%H406>farmers,<s%> <S%H3213>Wail,<s%> O <S%H3755>vinedressers,<s%> For the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and the <S%H8184>barley;<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> is destroyed.

The <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H3001>dries<s%> up, And the <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H8384>tree<s%> <S%H535>fails;<s%> The <S%H7416>pomegranate,<s%> the <S%H8558>palm<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> and the <S%H8598>apple<s%> <S%H8598>tree,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H3001>dry<s%> up. <S%H3588>Indeed,<s%> <S%H8342>rejoicing<s%> <S%H3001>dries<s%> up From the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

<S%H2296>Gird<s%> <S%H2296>yourselves<s%> [with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>], And <S%H5594>lament,<s%> O <S%H3548>priests;<s%> <S%H3213>Wail,<s%> O <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar!<s%> <S%H935>Come,<s%> <S%H3885>spend<s%> the <S%H3885>night<s%> in sackcloth, O <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of my <S%H430>God,<s%> For the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and the <S%H5262>libation<s%> Are <S%H4513>withheld<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H6942>Consecrate<s%> a <S%H6685>fast,<s%> <S%H7121>Proclaim<s%> a <S%H6116>solemn<s%> <S%H6116>assembly;<s%> <S%H622>Gather<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> [And] <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> To the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> And <S%H2199>cry<s%> out to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H162>Alas<s%> for the <S%H3117>day!<s%> For the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7138>near,<s%> And it will <S%H935>come<s%> as <S%H7701>destruction<s%> from the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>

Has not <S%H400>food<s%> been <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> our <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H8057>Gladness<s%> and <S%H1524>joy<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>?

The <S%H6507>seeds<s%> <S%H5685>shrivel<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H4053>clods;<s%> The <S%H214>storehouses<s%> are <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> The <S%H4460>barns<s%> are <S%H2040>torn<s%> <S%H2040>down,<s%> For the <S%H1715>grain<s%> is <S%H3001>dried<s%> up.

<S%H4100>How<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> <S%H584>groan!<s%> The <S%H5739>herds<s%> of <S%H1241>cattle<s%> <S%H943>wander<s%> <S%H943>aimlessly<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%> for them; <S%H1571>Even<s%> the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H816>suffer.<s%>

To Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I <S%H7121>cry;<s%> For <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> And the <S%H3852>flame<s%> has <S%H3857>burned<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

<S%H1571>Even<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H6165>pant<s%> for Thee; For the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H650>brooks<s%> are <S%H3001>dried<s%> up, And <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>
